channel.title: Decrypt
channel.description: What's new in crypto and the advent of the decentralized web.

item.title: You Can Play Super Nintendo, N64, and Other Classic Games on Bitcoin—Here’s How
item.description: UPDATED: Thanks to Ordinals, you can find video games and emulated consoles inscribed on the Bitcoin blockchain. Here’s how to play them.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: 'Dragon's Dogma 2' Beginner’s Guide: 8 Tips to Get Off to the Best Start
item.description: If you don't want to go into Capcom's latest adventure blind, our Dragon's Dogma 2 guide can help you make some smart early decisions.
item.dc:creator: Eric Frederiksen

item.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Bitcoin Halving Anticipation to Elation—Then Back to Work
item.description: The buzz around Runes was just as loud as the minting of the 840,000th BTC block.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Kawailani Ozawa

item.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Notcoin Token Delay, Ragnarok on Ethereum, More Saga Airdrops
item.description: If you spent last week following the frenzy around the Bitcoin halving and Runes launch, here's all of the crypto gaming news you missed.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: Solana, Ethereum Meme Coin Prices Blast Off as Bitcoin Stays Steady After Halving
item.description: Bitcoin was the biggest story coming into the weekend, but hype around the halving hasn’t fueled a price surge—not yet, at least.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: When Is the Next Bitcoin Halving?
item.description: Bitcoin's much talked-about halving just happened, and another one is already on the horizon. Here's when to expect it.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: What's Next for Bitcoin After the Halving?
item.description: Bitcoin's halving is here, so what happens next for crypto's oldest coin? Experts say that depends largely on macroeconomic factors.
item.dc:creator: André Beganski

item.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Halving Happens But BTC Doesn't Budge After a Dramatic Week
item.description: The Bitcoin halving happened early this morning, but after a tumultuous week, the biggest digital asset is sitting still.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Bitcoin Barely Bobbles After Halving
item.description: Four years in the making, the built-in cut in Bitcoin mining rewards didn't significantly change the price of BTC.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Kawailani Ozawa

item.title: Bitcoin Halving Is Here: Crypto Twitter Reacts
item.description: Bitcoin's 4th halving arrives with cheers and high hopes for a new era with the Runes protocol coming online.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: Bitcoin Completes Fourth Halving, Ushering In New Era for BTC
item.description: The Bitcoin network successfully underwent its fourth halving late Friday, cutting the amount of BTC that miners earn by half.
item.dc:creator: André Beganski

item.title: Meta Unveils Llama-3—We Put the New Top Open-Source AI Model to the Test
item.description: Llama 3, Meta's most advanced large language model arrived early and hit millions of devices across top apps. We took it for a test drive.
item.dc:creator: Jose Antonio Lanz

item.title: The Race Is On to Mint One of the First Bitcoin Runes
item.description: As the Bitcoin halving nears, anticipation builds among creators trying to etch one of the very first tokens via the Runes protocol.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: What the Bitcoin Halving Means for Ordinals and BRC-20 Tokens
item.description: Increased scarcity for Bitcoin after the halving, paired with demand for Runes tokens, could shake up the Ordinals space.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: Is the Bitcoin Bull Run Over—Or Just Getting Started? Experts Weigh In
item.description: As hopes for a Fed rate cut fade, Bitcoin is finding more sellers than buyers. Will the tide turn?
item.dc:creator: André Beganski

item.title: Bitcoin Runes Launch at the Halving: Here's Everything You Need to Know
item.description: The creator of Bitcoin’s Ordinals protocol is debuting a new fungible token standard to rival BRC-20. Here’s what you need to know.
item.dc:creator: Reza Jafery

item.title: Will the Bitcoin Halving Make BTC's Environmental Impact Better—or Worse?
item.description: The halving will reshape who mines Bitcoin, and thus the network’s energy efficiency, experts say. Will that offset BTC’s immense usage?
item.dc:creator: Sander Lutz

item.title: The Week in Polkadot: Gavin Wood Unveils ‘Major Upgrade’ JAM at Token2049
item.description: The Web3 Foundation has a 10 million DOT prize pool to foster development of the JAM protocol, which aims to replace Polkadot's Relay Chain.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: How to Mint Runes at the Bitcoin Halving Without Getting Rekt
item.description: With the Bitcoin halving on the horizon, anon Twitter user Leonidas broadcasted some top tips when minting Runes.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: Tether Launches USDT on TON Network, Telegram Wallet in Boon for Messaging App
item.description: The partnership with Tether is meant to rapidly expand TON’s attractiveness to a broader audience of non-crypto savvy Telegram users.
item.dc:creator: Sander Lutz

item.title: SEC Amends Justin Sun Lawsuit to Cite His Extensive Travel in US
item.description: The SEC argued that because Justin Sun "traveled extensively" to the U.S., the case falls under the regulator's jurisdiction.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Graves

item.title: Bitcoin Roller Coaster: BTC Retakes $65K Ahead of Halving
item.description: Bitcoin touched $65,000 as it experienced another jolt of volatility ahead of the BTC halving, set to take place late tonight.
item.dc:creator: Stacy Elliott

item.title: TON’s Justin Hyun Breaks Down The Importance of USDT Coming to Telegram
item.description: At Token 2049 in Dubai, The Open Network’s director of investments sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz to discuss what he sees as the game-changing integration of USDT onto TON, and his plans for getting Telegram’s 900 million users to start using crypto in the immediate future.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Dives Below $60,000 Less Than 24 Hours Before Halving
item.description: Bitcoin fell again late Thursday amid reports of explosions in Iran, and with the quadrennial halving event less than a day away.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: Meta Pushes AI Chatbot Into Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp
item.description: Meta has deployed its brand new Llama 3 AI model across its massively popular apps.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: The Price of BTC Won't Rise After Bitcoin Halving, JP Morgan Says
item.description: Analysts at America’s biggest bank say the quadrennial event has already been priced in for BTC.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Crypto Influencer Ansem Explains His Meme Coin Thesis and Why He’s Bullish on Bitcoin Runes
item.description: Ansem, the crypto trader who's amassed a sizable following on the back of meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF) and other calls, chats with Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz at Token 2049 Dubai about his meme coin thesis, why he's bullish on Bitcoin Runes, and what he sees ahead for the crypto markets.

item.title: Crypto Cat Fight: Why the Legal Claws Are Out Over Solana Meme Coin Shark Cat
item.description: Shark Cat used the likeness of a social media-famous feline without permission. Now the cat's owner is fighting back.
item.dc:creator: Reza Jafery,Sander Lutz

item.title: How Will Traders Handle Volatility Ahead of Bitcoin Halving? Analysts Are Split
item.description: On-chain analysis back a bullish view, but major banks see more losses ahead.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Throuvalas

item.title: Bitcoin Is a ‘Fraud’ Says Jamie Dimon, Who Vowed to Not Talk About It Again
item.description: The JP Morgan CEO revisits some of his classic digs, calling BTC a “decentralized Ponzi scheme.”
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: Yuga Labs Burns Nearly $1 Million Worth of Ethereum Gaming NFTs—Here's Why
item.description: Over 4,000 HV-MTL NFTs have been burned by Bored Ape Yacht Club creator Yuga Labs at the request of game studio Faraway.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: 'Is It Priced In?'—Unpacking Crypto’s Perennial Question on Bitcoin Halving Eve
item.description: The Bitcoin halving on Friday has been expected for years. Is the milestone priced in for BTC? Here’s a look back at historical examples.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum ETFs in Hong Kong Could Lead to 'More Progressive' Policies in China: OSL
item.description: Firms involved in upcoming Hong Kong ETFs believe that they may cause a ripple effect across Asia—possibly even in China.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: Mango Markets Attacker Guilty of Fraud Over $110 Million Exploit
item.description: Avraham Eisenberg was found guilty of manipulating the Solana DeFi platform Mango Markets in 2022 and fleeing the U.S. with the funds.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward,Jose Antonio Lanz

item.title: BitBoy One Preview: Everything You Need to Know About the Bitcoin Gaming Handheld
item.description: UPDATED: The first wave of BitBoy One Genesis handhelds sold out this week. Here's what you need to know about the Bitcoin gaming device.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: PS5 Pro Preview: Everything You Need to Know About the Next Sony PlayStation
item.description: Rumors of a PlayStation 5 Pro model are looming large. Here's everything we know so far about the anticipated Sony PS5 Pro.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: How the Bitcoin Halving Will Affect Miners Big and Small
item.description: Corporate miners have been prepared for the Bitcoin halving for months. At-home miners, by contrast, could face extinction.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Throuvalas

item.title: Peter Thiel-Backed Ethereum Layer-2 Launches Liquidity Program
item.description: The launch is "paving the way for a new era of innovation and growth in DeFi," said Layer N CEO and co-founder Dima Romanov.
item.dc:creator: Stacy Elliott

item.title: Pixelverse Announces Play-to-Airdrop Campaign with 10 Million $PIXFI Token Distribution
item.description: Dubai, AEU, April 18th, 2024, Chainwire   Quest-based battler game Pixelverse, who recently partnered with Mon Protocol the web3 publishing protocol of Pixelmon has announced a “Play-to-Airdrop” pre-listing campaign aimed at enriching the Web3 gaming landscape. Combining elements of exploration, crafting, and combat within a rich cyberpunk universe, the campaign is launching today introduces a […]
item.dc:creator: Chainwire

item.title: Why Did Binance Convert Its Whole SAFU Fund to USDC?
item.description: To ensure “reliability and stability” Binance has converted its entire insurance fund of BTC and BNB to USDC. But, what does this mean?
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: Decrypt's Sander Lutz Braves the Dubai Floods for a Crypto Conference
item.description: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz reports from Dubai amid a historic storm that flooded the famed city, trudging through the streets to complete his essential task: Attending the Token 2049 crypto conference.

item.title: Gold Beats Its All Time High
item.description: Bitcoin (BTC) maintains its trend of reaching higher lows amidst choppy market conditions. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness another influx of $125 million. There's anticipation of Hong Kong approving ETFs for both Bitcoin and Ethereum (ETH) come Monday. Notable institutional investor BlackRock shows interest in Bitcoin. Recent filings reveal increased Bitcoin purchases by banks. A Bitcoin-friendly political party secures victory in the South Korean election. Analyst Kang predicts Bitcoin could surge to $80-100k by May. Meanwhile, Ethereum sees accumulation by stablecoin whales on the rise. A new Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) aims to streamline signing requests. Solana (SOL) experiences a resurgence in activity, reaching yearly highs.

item.title: NASA’s Next Deep Space Mission Won’t Use Artificial Intelligence
item.description: On Thursday, Decrypt Media visited NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, CA to meet with the Engineering team behind the Europa Clipper before its launch to Jupiter's Europa moon in October.

item.title: We Do A Little with Weesh
item.description: In this week’s episode, we did a little something different. We took the man who is usually behind the camera and put him in front of it. We sat down with our producer Weesh to dive into how in fell in love with art and became a collector, how he met Andy and fun childhood memories together, his biggest wins in crypto, and so much more.

item.title: Inside VanEck’s Crypto Takeover of the New York Stock Exchange
item.description: Worlds collide as Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz heads to the floor of the NYSE to witness a special closing bell ceremony hosted by VanEck in honor of Web3. Featuring Choose Rich Nick, VanEck Head of Web3 Matt Bartlett, and more!

item.title: Wormhole Wednesday
item.description: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‘inflection point’ if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

item.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
item.description: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‘no trade zone’. This cycle acting ‘nothing like previous cycle’. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem’s cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.

item.title: We Do A Little With Spencer Gordon-Sand
item.description:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Spencer Gordon Sand, the mastermind behind Spencer Ventures. Before launching Spencer Ventures, Spencer was a competitive fencer, Magic the gathering player, and startup enjoyooor.
We dive into Spencer’s investment thesis behind NFTs and how his fund invests, finding and buying distressed assets in a bear market , point farming optimization, a peak behind the 3AC liquidation and dickbutt buys, and so much more.

item.title: How To Get Your Foot In Ihe Door And Building During Bear Markets
item.description:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Intern and Tunez from the Monad team. Prior to Monad, Tunez was working with Delphi Digital and Intern was working at CMS Holdings. They’re two of my oldest friends from crypto twitter.
We get into why they joined the Monad team, alpha for finding jobs in the space, biggest lessons from previous cycles, and so much more.

item.title: SBF Sentencing
item.description: BTC: 70.7k (+1%), ETH: 3585 (0%), SOL: 186 (-1%). Top 100 gainers: DOGE, GT, BCH, RBN. Crypto mixed, BTC-beta & memes outperform. SEC case vs Coinbase set to go to trial. DeFi win as case dismissed vs Coinbase wallet. ETFs see $244m inflows led by Ark. BlackRock ETF fastest growing in history: Fink. ETH ETF possible even if its a security: Fink. ETH spot ETF by May chances only 20%: GSR. SBF sentencing today, faces 50 years.

item.title: The $63 Million Exploit
item.description: BTC consolidates around $70k, funding still low. ETFs see $418m inflow as GBTC outflow tiny. BTC set to have record 7th-straight green month. AI coins soar, FET hits ATH amid merger rumour. FET, OCEAN, AGIX token proposed at $7.5bn FDV. DoJ charges KuCoin over money laundering. KuCoin sees $800m outflows after charges. CFTC names ETH & LTC commodities in charges. HK set to allow ‘in-kind’ style ETFs. HSBC launches tokenised gold fund. Fidelity files S1 form for ETH ETF. Short sellers bet $11bn crypto rally won’t last. More customer USDC balances to be stored on Base.

item.title: BTC Is Back On Top
item.description: BTC breaks $70K as $175M of shorts liquidated. ETFs see net inflow despite high GBTC outflows. Gold miner set to buy $1.7B BTC. UK to list crypto ETNs in May. ETH ETF may still be approved: Grayscale. Grayscale ETH discount falls to 22%. ETH ETF has no positive signs: Bloomberg. Coinbase pumps 10%, Ark continue to sell shares. Coinbase Int. record trading volumes in March. FTX to sell majority of Anthropic stake for $884M. Trader makes $20m profit in MEW rally. Puppets hit ATH, lead move higher in Ordinals. Azuki flips MAYC market cap in bounce. Magic Eden makes $15m in 30d trading revenue.

item.title: Base On Top
item.description: Majors continue to rally as ETF sentiment improves. Genesis have likely sold half their GBTC position. BlackRock could flip GBTC holdings in 3 weeks. BTC short squeeze would liquidate $6.6bn by $75k. Lack of on-chain activity indicates ‘limited selling’. BTC crucial to the financial system: BlackRock. Resurging interest in crypto assets: Goldman Sachs. Crypto summer has started: Raoul Pal. Base outpaces SOL & ETH for trading volumes.

item.title: ETF Outflows Continue
item.description: Despite Bitcoin's decline, several alternative cryptocurrencies remain robust. Fantom (FTM) emerges as the top-performing Layer 1 blockchain, while Coinbase introduces futures trading. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness a $94 million outflow, although outflows from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) may decelerate. Approximately $1 billion worth of Bitcoin shorts face liquidation if prices reach $67.8k. Coinbase's premium resurfaces, marking the first occurrence since Bitcoin's all-time high. Bitcoin continues its streak with seven consecutive months of positive performance. Solana's (SOL) decentralized exchange (DEX) achieves a monthly volume of $50 billion, with revenue soaring 30-fold. OKX announces support for a new Solana token standard. Despite expectations, Layer 2 activity remains sluggish post-Dencun, according to Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: We Do A Little With Postwook
item.description:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Natasha Chomko aka Postwook. Postwook is a Los Angeles based digital artist focused on cooking up some of the most visually pleasing and nostalgia provoking surreal landscape collage art.
We dive into Postwook’s origin story, training like an athlete as an artist, diversifying income streams, beating addiction, dealing with the ebbs and flows of being a full time artist in a volatile space, and so much more.

item.title: Scaling Ethereum and Aligning Incentives with the Chief Strategic Officer of Offchain Labs
item.description:
In this episode, we are joined by AJ Warner, the Chief Strategic Officer of Offchain Labs, the main contributors to the Arbitrum ecosystem. AJ is a gigabrain chad who joined the Offchain Labs in November 2020 and has been their CSO since January 2022.
We dive into AJ’s crypto origin story, how he joined Offchain Labs, the technical and ideological differences between Arbitrum and other scaling solutions, how the scaling solution business model works, the biggest blockers in crypto as investors and builders, and so much more.

item.title: Founding The Nifty & BoDoggos, learnings from multiple years of hosting daily shows, and leveling up the crypto content industry
item.description:
Starting Season 4 of We Do A Little with a great interview featuring Nick and Pio from The Nifty and BoDoggos.
Alongside developing their business and identity, they have consistently delivered entertaining morning shows and humorous content centered around the crypto.
In this episode, we delve into Nick and Pio’s backgrounds prior to collaborating, explore the story of their meeting, discuss their individual sources of inspiration, examine their strategic approach to expanding the Nifty team, and much more.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin Discusses Ethereum's Dencun Upgrade and More at ETH Taipei 2024
item.description: Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin answers questions from Rug Radio and other media outlets at ETH Taipei 2024. He discusses the recent Dencun network upgrade and a variety of other topics. (Credit: Rug Radio/Decrypt)
